r.s: Asynchronous and concurrent and distributed networking framework for PHP.
r.d: Asynchronous and concurrent and distributed networking framework for PHP. - event-driven - full asynchronous non-blocking - multi-thread reactor - multi-process worker - millisecond timer - async MySQL - async task - async read/write file system - async dns lookup - support IPv4/IPv6/UnixSocket/TCP/UDP - SSL/TLS encrypted transmission
r.n: - Added swoole_atomic module, support for atomic integer operations - Fixed timer in the system can not recover after the resumption of the operation - Fixed ssl_server cannot send more than 30K large packages in a slow network - Added supports for UDP/UDP6/UNIX_DGRAM big packages(64K) - Fixed addtimer/tick timer can't be used in BASE mode - Added addProcess in SWOOLE_BASE mode - Fixed SWOOLE_KEEP core dump
